thread.section_title: Gamecheap Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gamecheap | gamecheap.net | 6 of 68
thread.title: Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text:
You can't beat the price that they offered! Very easy to make the purchase. The reason they did not get an entire five stars is because I purchased the digital download code for Xbox live at about 3 o'clock in the afternoon expecting to be able to get the code the same day. Unfortunately I had to email them at noon the next day to ask when it was coming. After my email, they delivered it immediately.
I wish I had been the 5 to 60 minutes that they had stated on their website rather then the next day, but in the end it worked out.
